title: Why do people put technology before mankind? - Quora

response.answer_text: I see technology more as an extension of mankind. Prosthetic devices and chemical and surgical intervention enable people with physical disabilities to function more effectively in their environment, which is considered a positive thing. As technology and science progress, we simply move forward in the ways that we can augment the human body to perform better. It’s no longer a question if science will make greater longevity a reality, but rather when science we’ll intervene in aging.
